actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.

official_title: To prohibit the obligation of funds to pay the salary of the Secretary of Homeland Security until a biometric entry and exit data system has been fully implemented, and for other purposes.
short_title: Preventing Illegal Visa Overstays Act of 2016
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Preventing Illegal Visa Overstays Act of 2016

This bill prohibits the obligation of funds to pay the salary of the Secretary of Homeland Security until a biometric entry and exit data system has been fully implemented.

titles.title: Preventing Illegal Visa Overstays Act of 2016
